Events.PreEventString: You find an old wooden chest. You find $1 inside.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: A mysterious figure starts materializing in front of you. The figure is a perfect clone of you, as if looking into a mirror. Suddenly, it attacks!.
Events.PostEventString: The figure vanishes without a trace. Better keep going before it appears again.

Events.PreEventString: An old man is standing in front of you with a blank stare. He smells like coffee. He says 'You don't know how to catch a Pokémon? I suppose I had better show you then!'.
Events.PostEventString: He throws a Pokeball at the middle of the room, but there wasn't anything in there. Then, the old man stays in place, not doing anything. YOU FEEL A SENSE OF UNEASINESS, AS SOMETHING IN THE WORLD HAD TEMPORARILY BROKEN.

Events.PreEventString: You feel an evil prescence behind you. You're suddenly attacked by a $1!
This room has a lot of abandoned machinery and weird looking equipment. Conencted to it is a piece of evolution crystal. It weakly whispers: yE who s..k AWakneAN ; L3T us Be.begin.
Events.PostEventString: The crystal stops glowing, completely drained out of energy. It's time to move on.

Events.PreEventString: Even though you're in a mansion, it is still an extension of the berry forest, with many healthy berries to eat.
Events.PostEventString: Your team eats some berries and have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: Even though you're in a mansion, it is still an extension of the berry forest, with many healthy berries to eat.
Events.PostEventString: $1 eats some berries. It is fully healed.

Events.PreEventString: Even though you're in a mansion, it is still an extension of the berry forest, with many healthy berries to eat.
Events.PostEventString: Your team eats some berries and have recovered from harmful conditions.

Events.PreEventString: Even though you're in a mansion, it is still an extension of the berry forest, with many healthy berries to eat.
Events.PostEventString: Your team eats some berries and their moves recover some PP.

Events.PreEventString: A group of young trickster pokemon challenges you to a fight. You don't feel any malice from them, seems they just want to play.
Events.PostEventString: The pokemon are satisfied and happy, they move along gleefuly.

Events.PreEventString: A Banette appears out of nowhere and gives you a gift-wrapped box.
Events.PostEventString: You open the box, which immediately explodes! Your Pokemon sustain some damage.

Events.PreEventString: A Banette appears out of nowhere and gives you a gift-wrapped box.
Events.PostEventString: You open the box, which releases a large amount of sleeping gas. $1 is now asleep.

Events.PreEventString: You find a very old wallet in the floor.
Events.PostEventString: You open it. Contains no ID, but you grab $1 that was inside.

Events.PreEventString: You see $1, but something doesn't seem right. They seem possessed! 'H..help me', they say. You quickly grab some medicines from their bag and start a fight.
Events.PostEventString: $1 regains their senses. They owe you big time.

Floors.ShortcutClue: A weird wormhole has appeared, linking this room with another room further ahead. But it's closing quick! Think fast!
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 is fast enough to help you keep the portal open. You pass through.

Floors.ShortcutClue: A lot of ghost Pokemon are fooling around having fun. 'TrIcK or TrEaT¿', they vocalize! They seem to want a present or something...
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 seems to have done the trick. They laught about and lead you deeper through the mansion.

Floors.ShortcutClue: No way through the fog but forward. Nowhere else to go.

BossEvent.PreEventString: The fog is too thick to be able to see or advance every further. You feel the prescence of an entity, a mix of playful and threatening.
BossEvent.PostEventString: Creature dissapears in the fog. The fog dissipates just for a moment, and you find the path back to safety. What could have happened in this place?.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: You find a dining room in the mansion. You still feel uneasy, as if something was watching you, but it's probably still the best place for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But for now it's time to move on...
